{{item:3301}} says in the tooltip "Minions killed by your allies" so I don't understand why it would benefit a solo laner.

{{item:3303}} {{item:3302}} need some sort of special casing to stop them working in solo lanes.
it still also grants Passive gold. And {{item:3069}} movementspeed is probably used by nasus
If a minion or turret kills a minion, it counts as an ally. With kleptomancy, he can just ignore the wave when he feels like it to get more gold.
but at the same time nasus normaly wants to stack his q... And an Ap Nasus or just E max Poke Ad/Tank would still clear the wave too.
I have been playing on the pbe, and it just feels better, being able to always have that extra item slot, and being able to have some nice stats on an item rather than getting the sight stone.
It's like everyone forgot that in a few days, every support item is going to be turned into a Sightstone...
and then you realize that every single other gold gen item is being changed... so your argument falls flat on it's face
Again the relic shield is nothing new ........people were doing it right when relic shield was first made . Also mid laners take frost queens all the time
I was using coin on nasus way before anyone else. Would have 25% cooldown rate at lvl 1 and could start the stacking fast and early. I was cool with coin before all the normies started using it.
